text:
76 y/o M with CAD s/p CABG, s/p mechanical AVR, Afib; currently
   hospitalized for MSSA endocarditis with complications of ARF s/p abx,
   CHB (has screw in temp wire and external pacemaker Rt brachial site),
   runs of torsades, and leukocytoclastic dermatitis on skin biopsy as
   complication of abx, now transferred to CCU under MICU service with
   respiratory distress, hypoxemia, and hemoptysis. Pt intubated and
   bronched on [**1-27**] showed diffuse alveolar hemorrhage and fluid overload.
   Repeat Bronch [**1-28**] removed some old blood, no new bleeding.  Echo
   showed EF >55%. CRRT started on [**1-27**] for fluid overload. [**1-29**] renal
   biopsy at bedside. Pt continues with rash on BLE. Heels red,
   nonblanching
 elevated off of mattress on pillows.
   Renal failure, acute (Acute renal failure, ARF)
   Assessment:
   Pt transferred from CCU and reinitiated on CRRT on prismaflex.  CRRT
   running without clots present and pressures within normal limits.
   Tolerating 200cc/hour removal with BP maintained 130
s-170
s/60
   Action:
   Goal removal increased to 250cc/hour.  CVP transduced to sideport of HD
   line
   Response:
   Continues to tolerate volume removal, hemodynamically stable.
   Plan:
   Assess for overdiuresis.
   Respiratory failure, acute (not ARDS/[**Doctor Last Name **])

   Action:
   Response:
   Plan:
